ygData.subject: Re: Another Question about  Fear
ygData.msgSnippet: Okay heres the thing about Fear and FOL they both work on PC s and work great. When someone is feared they walk away more or less in a straight line until it
ygData.messageBody:
Okay heres the thing about Fear and FOL they both work on PC's
and work great. When someone is feared they walk away more or less in a
straight line until it wears off. (usaully only use this to get a heal in or
run to another Loc to confuse the opponent) and blinding tehm is great to
but with blind you will need to go up from behind them and melee soi they
can't hit you but you can hit them(If wizzys cant see their spell icons they
cant use them:) Their duration depends on your lvl and teh NPC's magic
resistance. FOL is good on NPC's when you blind them though back up cause if
you stand in the same place they will still hit you however if you back up
tehn they will (all i have ever seen them do) run away same as fear but they
cant see where they are running. Any more questions:)


Krix Mathar
Guardians of Lore <High Guardian>
-----Original Message-----
From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
To: 'EQ-Clerics@onelist.com' <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Friday, July 16, 1999 12:28 PM
Subject: [EQ-Clerics] Another Question about Fear


>From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>
>Thanks for your answers, just what I thought.
>
>Can you tell me though does Fear work on PC's not just on NPC's. i.e. in a
>PvP situation?
>
>Thanks
>
>Nynenom
>
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mystik [mailto:mystik@...]
>Sent: Friday, July 16, 1999 1:32 AM
>To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Fear Vs Spook the undead
>
>
>From: Mystik <mystik@...>
>
>it depends on what you're fearing....if you're in unrest, just use spook
>since it's less mana....but fear is good anywhere else
>
>(\/)ystix Spellchaser
>lv 41 human cleric of The Rathe
>
>Chas Watkins wrote:
>
>> From: Chas Watkins <cwatkins@...>
>>
>> I am about to get fear. Can I still use Spook against the undead. Or will
>> Fear be more successful.
>>
>> It's just that Fear takes 40 Mana while Spook takes just 10 Mana.
>>
>> Thanks
>>
>> Nynenom
>> Rallos Zek
>>
>>
>>
